records.text: (4/6) With the song now completed after nearly 40 years, I decided to release it as part of the “Open Your Eyes” single, which was now a 3-song EP. About a week or two later, WXPN in Philadelphia announced a 24-hour song challenge for June 1. I wound up writing “Beyond Forever” as a warmup for the contest and “Summer’s Not My Thing” as my actual submission. And that’s how a simple single became my 5-track EP, Open Your Eyes, which is available to stream/download at https://bit.ly/oye24ep

records.text: (4/6) With the song now completed after nearly 40 years, I decided to release it as part of the “Open Your Eyes” single, which was now a 3-song EP. About a week or two later, WXPN in Philadelphia announced a 24-hour song challenge for June 1. I wound up writing “Beyond Forever” as a warmup for the contest and “Summer’s Not My Thing” as my actual submission. And that’s how a simple single became my 5-track EP, Open Your Eyes, which is available to stream/download at https://bit.ly/oye24ep
